title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, notice that all tabs in the TabFolder and all frames flash excessively.
OB: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all frames flash.
EB: When resizing the window in the vertical direction only, the tabs in the TabFolder and frames should not flash excessively.
SR:
1. Open the control example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and frames are flashing excessively.
